Name: Gore-Scarf
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Grass-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Clamperl, Huntail, and Gorebyss.  Finding a Gore-Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
